FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the user this session belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: source
FIELD.COMMENT: Where this session was recorded.

FIELD.NAME: timestart
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this session was started.

FIELD.NAME: timefinish
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the session ended.

FIELD.NAME: tag
FIELD.COMMENT: Tag for the session.

FIELD.NAME: locale
FIELD.COMMENT: The locale for this session.

FIELD.NAME: data
FIELD.COMMENT: JSON encoded biometric data.

TABLE.NAME: bioauth_dict
TABLE.COMMENT: Strings which may appear in an answer, not necessarily whole words.

FIELD.NAME: text
FIELD.COMMENT: The character sequence.

FIELD.NAME: postag
FIELD.COMMENT: A part of speech tag for character sequence.

TABLE.NAME: bioauth_feature_sets
TABLE.COMMENT: Feature sets for behavioral biometric sequences.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: A name for the set of features.

FIELD.NAME: locale
FIELD.COMMENT: The locale this feature set was intended for.

FIELD.NAME: keystrokefeatures
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma-separated list of keystroke feature ids.

FIELD.NAME: stylometryfeatures
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma-separated list of stylometry feature ids.

TABLE.NAME: bioauth_keystroke_features
TABLE.COMMENT: Temporal keystroke feature sets for behavioral biometric sequences.

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: Type of feature: duration, t1, t2, t3, t4

FIELD.NAME: group1
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma-separated list of key ids for the first group.

FIELD.NAME: group2
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma-separated list of key ids for the second group.

FIELD.NAME: fallback
FIELD.COMMENT: The feature to fall back to, or null.

FIELD.NAME: measure
FIELD.COMMENT: The measure function to use on the observations gathered for this feature.

FIELD.NAME: distance
FIELD.COMMENT: The distance between the two keystrokes in the sequence.

TABLE.NAME: bioauth_stylometry_features
TABLE.COMMENT: Temporal keystroke feature sets for behavioral biometric sequences.

FIELD.NAME: group1
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma-separated list of key ids for the first group.

FIELD.NAME: group2
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma-separated list of key ids for the second group.

FIELD.NAME: fallback
FIELD.COMMENT: The feature to fall back to, or null.

FIELD.NAME: measure
FIELD.COMMENT: The measure function to use on the observations gathered for this feature.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the user this session belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: tag
FIELD.COMMENT: Tag for the session.

FIELD.NAME: locale
FIELD.COMMENT: The locale for this session.

FIELD.NAME: data
FIELD.COMMENT: JSON encoded biometric data.

TABLE.NAME: bioauth_quiz_validations
TABLE.COMMENT: Validations performed on a population with a particular feature set

FIELD.NAME: quizid
FIELD.COMMENT: The quiz this validation was performed on.

FIELD.NAME: featuresetid
FIELD.COMMENT: The feature set used for validation.

FIELD.NAME: state
FIELD.COMMENT: The state of this validation.

FIELD.NAME: neighborids
FIELD.COMMENT: CSV list of neighbor entries for reference/query combinations

FIELD.NAME: timestart
FIELD.COMMENT: Time when the validation was started.

FIELD.NAME: timefinish
FIELD.COMMENT: Time when the validation was completed. 0 if the validation has not finished yet.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Last modified time.

FIELD.NAME: timecheckstate
FIELD.COMMENT: Next time bioauth cron should check attempt for state changes. NULL means never check.

TABLE.NAME: bioauth_neighbors
TABLE.COMMENT: The neighbors for a reference/query authentication attempt

FIELD.NAME: refuserid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the reference user

FIELD.NAME: queryuserid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the query user

FIELD.NAME: neighbors
FIELD.COMMENT: CSV list of the within/between neighbors
